metadata.dc:author: Rodríguez Alvarez de la Marina, J
Díaz Domínguez, J
Lázaro Santander, R
Galindo García, A
De la Rosa del Rey, P
metadata.dc:description: We report the case of a patient who underwent a left nephrectomy for clear cell adenocarcinoma. Four years later he presented with jaundice due to a single metastasis of the same tumour in the head of the pancreas which was resected. The favourable prognosis with surgery encourages a radical approach.
metadata.dc:title: Metástasis solitaria pancreática metacrónica de un adenocarcinoma renal.
[Solitary metachronous pancreatic metastasis of renal adenocarcinoma].
metadata.dc:publisher: Revista espanola de enfermedades digestivas : organo oficial de la Sociedad Espanola de Patologia Digestiva
